channel.title: Characters on Art of Dmitry Brushray
channel.description: Recent content in Characters on Art of Dmitry Brushray

item.title: Plague Marine, Foul Fighter fan art
item.description: Hey everyone! Check out my latest Warhammer fan art featuring a Nurgle Plague Marine. Corrupted by the foul blessings of Nurgle, this warrior is a testament to the power of the Lord of Decay. His rusted armor and diseased body spread twisted corruption that runs rampant in the 41st millennium. #brushray #artbrushray #artist #art #painting #artcommissions #buyart #Warhammer40k #Nurgle #PlagueMarine #FanArt #Chaos #ArtOfTheDay #Hobby #TabletopGaming #Wargaming #warhammer #warhammercommunity #grimadark #40k #SpaceMarines #DeathGuard #SciFi #monster #horror #NurgleRot #horusheresy #warhammerart

item.title: Robot-gunslinger
item.description: Attempt to paint something both looking like wild west and samurai vibe in loose traditional manner using digital media. I hope you like the art and have fun! #brushray #artbrushray #artist #art #painting #artcommissions #buyart #robot #cowboy #gunslinger #samurai #fantasyart #sciencefiction #characterdesign #illustration #digitalart #conceptart #sword #revolver #futuretech #cyborg #western #samuraisword #mecha #robotart #robotcharacter #scifiart #robotcowboy #robotsamurai #characterart #digitalillustration #sketchbook #artlife #artshare #cyberpunk #robotics #mech #futurewarrior #artcollector #animeart #mechdesign #robotwarrior #weaponart #robotgunslinger

item.title: Brother Samial Venritus of Dark Angels
Iron Butchers preparations for a battle, plus a story.
item.description: We've seen plenty of art and video how space marines are served and prepared for a battle. All these are about loyal astartes. Correct me, but I've never seen an art where renegades or chaos marines are served. It may be some of them no need such procedure as they fused with their armor. But I think there are warbands and space marines which are less corrupted by chaos and still needed this service every once in a while. So we thought it would be interesting to imagine how ironclading could look like for ChSM. And today I'm happy to show you the result along with the small description below.
